item.description: Real Art Ways in Hartford hosts a FREE monthly board game night the first Tuesday of every month. They have a large selection of games available to play, or you can bring your own favorite games. Snacks and beverages are available for purchase as well. The event goes until 10PM. If you plan to go, contact Cliff from our group who is a regular attendee. He'll help make sure everybody finds everybody else from our group. Word has it that this event is a blast! Let's show our support for a great Hartford organization and have fun doing what we do best! http://www.realartways.org/

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Monthly Board Game Night at Real Art Ways in Hartford
